snippet: We are currently sourcing a Staff Accountant/Full-Charge Bookkeeper position for a manufacturing company in Minneapolis. This would be a contract to full-time...
teaser:
We are currently sourcing a Staff Accountant/Full-Charge Bookkeeper position for a manufacturing company in Minneapolis. This would be a contract to full-time position. The hours for this Accountant are 8:00am - 5:00pm with an hour lunch and free parking.

Duties Include:
  • Accounts Payable - coding, authorizing and processing payments
  • General Ledger - assist with month end, preparing accruals and journal entries
  • Accounts Receivable - assist with posting cash applications and running credit references
  • Payroll - back up when needed
Requirements:
  • 2 or 4 year degree in Accounting, Finance or related degree
  • Large ERP knowledge (I.E. Timberline, QuickBooks, SAP) is preferred
  • Good personality and self motivated accountant
If you are interested in this position, please call us right away at 612.339.5521.
Intermediate Accounts Payable, Basic General Ledger, Basic Cash Applications, Basic Benefits - Payroll, Basic Bank Reconciliations, Intermediate Accounts Receivable, Intermediate Timberline.
